subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – a human figure (compare {{zh-l|*大}}) with water falling from them (roughly from arm pits). Original form of {{och-l|腋|armpit}} or {{och-l|液|liquid}}.
